data.name: Ssl_accept_renegotiates
data.type: number of negotiates needed to establish the tls connection.

data.name: Ssl_accepts
data.type: number of accepted tls handshakes.

data.name: Ssl_callback_cache_hits
data.type: number of sessions retrieved from session cache.

data.name: Ssl_cipher
data.type: tls cipher in use.

data.name: Ssl_cipher_list
data.type: list of available tls ciphers.

data.name: Ssl_client_connects
data.type: number of tls handshakes started in client mode.

data.name: Ssl_connect_renegotiates
data.type: number of negotiates needed to establish the connection to an tls-enabled master.

data.name: Ssl_ctx_verify_depth
data.type: how many tls certificates in the chain are tested.

data.name: Ssl_ctx_verify_mode
data.type: tls context verification mode.

data.name: Ssl_default_timeout
data.type: tls default timeout, in seconds.

data.name: Ssl_finished_accepts
data.type: number of successful tls sessions in server mode.

data.name: Ssl_finished_connects
data.type: number of successful tls sessions in client mode.

data.name: Ssl_server_not_after
data.type: last valid date for the tls certificate.

data.name: Ssl_server_not_before
data.type: first valid date for the tls certificate.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_hits
data.type: number of tls sessions found in the session cache.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_misses
data.type: number of tls sessions not found in the session cache.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_mode
data.type: mode used for tls caching by the server.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_overflows
data.type: number of sessions removed from the session cache because it was full.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_size
data.type: size of the session cache.

data.name: Ssl_session_cache_timeouts
data.type: number of sessions which have timed out.

data.name: Ssl_sessions_reused
data.type: number of sessions reused.

data.name: Ssl_used_session_cache_entries
data.type: current number of sessions in the session cache.

data.name: Ssl_verify_depth
data.type: tls verification depth.

data.name: Ssl_verify_mode
data.type: tls verification mode.

data.name: Ssl_version
data.type: tls version in use.
